testSteps.description: Given user on the main page and click button login
When user input "aulia@gmail.com" on email field
And user input " " on password field
Then user see validate message "password can not empty"

userStory.storyName: As an user, I want to success login and success register, So that i can see my home page
userStory.displayName: As an user, I want to success login and success register, So that i can see my home page
